welcome_message_body: "Welcome to picturesque Hessle! Get ready to experience the charm of this small town known for its beautiful architecture, friendly locals, and stunning views of the Humber River. Enjoy your stay and make sure to explore all that Hessle has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Humaita Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to regional flights within Brazil.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Humberside International Airport handles all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Humberside International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Robin Hood Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Robin Hood Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
